name: 4Pillars
description:
Welcomed and taunted by a mysterious voice, the knight is faced with multiple challenges that tests his spirit, patience and skills in combat.

Patience is key with this adventure game based on the four pillars: darkness, light, spirit and fear.

Navigate through deadly dungeons, dodge spike traps and swinging blades and conquer the most intense boss fights in this adventure game. Packed with monstrous characters that will stop at nothing to prevent you from wreaking havoc in their domain.

Are you prepared?

KEY FEATURES:

◆ Conquer intense boss fights.
◆ Explore and navigate through deadly dungeons.
◆ Survive challenging traps and puzzles.
◆ Find out who you are and what you’ve done.
◆ Test your skills, combat and timing.
◆ Survive engaging battles.
